post.body: youWas going to try and attune for this weekend in case i can make it
you going to be on tonight?
Always could rely on you for a good BONK (ok, that sounded worse then it is)
not sure, but that call just sucked the happiness from my day.
not as close as you are to 30
your that close? That's excellent. /cheer
gratz
good luck on your final
<brat>*fake blush*</brat>
i wish
you are getting sleeeepy....very sleeeeepy.
how was your Christmas?
dell
only 2 years
he got most of his money back. think it's time for a new drive
no load. CHKDSK report "unrecoverable errors". Downloading UBCD to see I can get more info
possibly corrupt disk. Might be a virus, but that's geek squad's diagnosis. Not really trusting what they said
should be in Iowa until sometime Monday. Not sure on our schedule. I think the wife has a girl's night out Saturday
welcome back to the states. Have a fantastic time
Fairly certain my stress level has reached a new higb
I love customer service that is actually customer service. Thank you J!NX, you rock
you know things are bad when you're doing what I'm doing now. nothing dangerous. don't ask though. you don't want to know :)
dealing with work issues. Tired and cranky.
Would be nice to just stay in bed for the day. Too much to do :P
I am so f****ing tired. 2am is too late to be up working.ZZZZZZZzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz
Home at last. Only took 3 hours
I think my brain just froze. May need someone to hit the reset button
Just made a call to a dear friend of mine. Her daughter decided to go live with her dad and left a day before her mom's birthday.
Almost got into an accident this morning. Turn lane was a sheet of ice and had to bump the curb to avoid rear ending someone
201,161,165 can't say the last time that happened
40th birthday decorating going on the other side of my cube wall. May need to come in early to see reaction of cube resident
Managed to recover pretty much everything from the old HD. Feeling much better about this recovery
Dear Dell. Please include your network driver on the ****ing recovery CD
Needed to charge ipod. Windoze woukdn't charge it w/o driver. Linux did it with no problems. Linux wins again
Wondering what the sun looks like. Heard it's warm and bright
I think @snoopymom and her crew might be buying out the mall ;)
Hmmm. No bad sectors. MBR is reported as bad. Fixmbr doesn't work. Might try a new drive and then try to recover to new drive
Trying to fix FIL's computer. Not going so well
Things not to forget when traveling: power cord for your laptop.
Half way to Iowa. Kids doing ok. No major meltdowns. Yet.
